GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id ordered by the most recent comment first

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object for the given username
